channel.title: Good idea
channel.description: Hello there people.Im giving an idea for MoparScape owners. Well,i stopped playing runescape for,like 1 month ago.Today,ive logged in again,then i saw the new graphics. They're awesome!So,i was thinking,i know that should be hard,but why MoparScape dont try to update :| the moparscape graphics?Varrock is now 100% diferent.Some monster has new graphics...It should be nice update.Why you guys dont try?

item.title: Good idea
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Someone is currently working on a 45? server. When that is released, along with the client, you’ll be able to walk around in the new Varrock area.

Read full topic
